name: CKoban (really early demo)
description:
This is a really early build of a game i've been working on my spare time for a long time now, it's pretty short and there isn't a save function, i recommend playing through it all at once.

Playing with sound on is recommended but not required.

The web version above works, but i'd play the Windows version if possible.

Just in case the controls aren't obvious from the prompts in the first level:

  • Arrow keys: movement
  • Hold shift: run
  • Control + R: restart level
  • Control + Z: undo
  • Pretty much every other key i think: You'll find out hopefully

If you have any feedback after playing please let me know, i'd love to hear it!

You can post your feed back in the comments or contact me through twitter. 

  • Twitter: https://twitter.com/hdelima_
